title: Font from header image
content:
Hey guys,  
Could you please identify the HSS font in the attached image?  
Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [hss.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020165917/http:/typophile.com/files/hss.gif) | 5.93 KB |
author: morpheu5

comments.content: Looks like [Helvetica Neue](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020165917/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neue-helvetica) and possibly squooshed for second and third lines.
